To reset Google play
--------------------
This will fix a variety of Google Play, Google Talk related errors, like authentication errors, RFC errors and will reset the primary Google account.


Get rid of Primary Account, use ES file explorer, 
Enable Root Explorer and Mount R/W.  Go to local, then up to root folder, click the data folder, click the system folder.

Hold down the left click on accounts.db, choose delete.

Go to Settings, Applications, Manage
Go to the ALL tab at the top.

Scroll down to
Google Play Services
Click "clear data" button

Go back and repeat for the following:
Google Play Store
Google Services Framework
Talk
Talkatone
Download


Restart BlueStacks by right-clicking the system tray icon, and choose restart.

Open GMAIL, add your Google account!

Enjoy!
-JS

I have problems with Zenonia 5, asks me to put ID, then a white something appears, then I typed, then I can't press enter.

Try using ES task manager and killing all running tasks.  Bluestacks provision 768MB RAM, you need to free some.  You can increase it to 851MB in the by modifying the registry key memory at
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/BlueStacks/Guests/Android

Set the value of MEMORY to decimal 960, then you get 851MB, I dunno why 960, but it works.
-js
the other thing is be patient loading an app, the ARM translator gets pounded hard by games when loading into RAM, it can be slow
Oh okay, thanks... Do you know how to install Freedom for In App Purchases? Thanks

using freedom

get the latest here
http://system.in-appstore.com/freedom/download.php

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Click "MENÙ" on your phone and go to "SETTINGS".
2. On "SETTINGS" scroll down and go to "DATE & TIME".
3. Uncheck "AUTOMATIC TIME ZONE".
4. Go to "SELECT TIME ZONE" and choose "Moscow GMT+4".
5. Go back to the home, run FREEDOM app again, and enjoy!
Thanks for all the help, I'll come back if I need more. Haha, I'll be trying this with my Windows 8 tab next week.

Windows 8 isn't too bad... Biggest prob with 8 is ensure you have proper rights.  Run everything as administrator for good measure, have fun!
-js
